data.prayer: Please, convict the 14,381 believers in Kasaragod, Kerala, India to look to you as their only hope for strength and fruitfulness and life.
data.verse: "I am the vine; you are the branches. If you remain in me and I in you, you will bear much fruit; apart from me you can do nothing.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Kasaragod, Kerala, India
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, please, raise up a generation of disciples in the county of Kasaragod who will make disciples who make disciples.
Father, thank you that you will never abandon the church of Kasaragod, Kerala, India.
data.verse: Be free from the love of money, content with such things as you have, for he has said, “I will in no way leave you, neither will I in any way forsake you.

data.prayer: Lord, teach your Word to the people of the the county of Kasaragod, so that they can follow your ways all their life.
data.verse: Teach me, Lord, the way of your decrees, that I may follow it to the end.

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Arasar people. 0.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Father, please send teachers of your Word in Kasaragod who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.
Spirit, help the 14,381 believers find a person of peace today among the 1,293,019 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.section_summary:
the county of Kasaragod, Kerala, India has a population of 1,307,400.

We estimate Kasaragod has 14,381 people who might know Jesus, 15,863 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,277,156 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the county of Kasaragod, Kerala, India who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.
